ygData.subject: Re: Euridite?
ygData.msgSnippet: There s no good answer to that.┬á Basically any race that is a necromancer besides a Dark Elf Necromancer will have problems anywhere.┬á The good thing is
ygData.messageBody:
There's no good answer to that.∩┐╜ Basically any race that is a necromancer
besides a Dark Elf Necromancer will have problems anywhere.∩┐╜ The good thing
is usually you aren't KOS everywhere (cept mage's guilds and whatnot)∩┐╜ Dark
Elves are KOS in a lot of places and Dark Elf Necromancers have prices on
their heads in almost all places.∩┐╜ The good thing about being a Dark Elf
Necromancer is that you are fine in your city and the Troll and Ogre
cities.∩┐╜ Everyone will do business with you and no one is KOS.
∩┐╜
Personally I think its a matter of preference.∩┐╜ Non Dark Elf Necromancers
have access to a LOT more areas, but generally have a harder time dealing
with EVERYONE whereas Dark Elves are totally blocked out of some areas but
in South Antonica they have NO problems.∩┐╜ And believe me, there is plenty of
zones and leveling areas in South Antonica so you can level high enough so
worrying about guards becomes less and less a problem.
∩┐╜
Malark on Karana

-----Original Message-----
From: Mata [mailto:mata_eq@...]
Sent: Monday, May 17, 1999 9:45 AM
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Euridite?


Are Euridite Necros more liked than Gnome Necros???
∩┐╜
by Good races or Evil Races ...∩┐╜
∩┐╜
thanks
∩┐╜
